actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
payments.payment_ticket_status,
payments.payment_start_date,
payments.payment_end_date,
payments.payment_type,
payments.payment_mode, 
payments.payment_status,
payments.amount_paid, 
payments.taxable_amt,
payments.gst_amt,
payments.payment_id, 
payments.transaction_id, 
payments.transaction_date,  
payments.payment_source,
payments.retailer_code,
payments.payment_clearance_status, 
payments.payment_received_by,
payments.remarks,
payments.created_time, 
payments.created_by, 
payments.deleted,  
payments.updated_time, 
payments.updated_by,  
payments.payment_clear_date,  
payments.invoice_sent_status, 
payments.invoice_no
from payments where retailer_code = {{retailer_code.selectedOptionValue}}
and deleted=false 
order by created_time desc;
